sentence.text: Through the examination of 48 candidate genes known to be responsible for autosomal recessive SPG, we identified a novel homozygous 4-bp deletion, c.914_917delGTAA, p.Ser305Ilefs*2 in exon2 of the DDHD1 gene encoding phosphatidic acid-preferring phospholipase A1 (positive regulation of mitochondrial fission).
Spastic paraplegia (intraciliary transport) muscle organ development 28 is an autosomal recessive SPG caused by mutations in the positive regulation of mitochondrial fission gene.
